'''''Amon Hen'' 301''' is the three-hundred-and-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in June [[2023]].

==Contents==
* Front and back cover illustrated by: [[Ralph Damiani]]
* '''4''' - Annual General Meeting
* '''6''' - 2023 Tolkien Society Awards
* '''8''' - Book Review: The History of the Hobbit by Amanda Drake
* '''9''' - Tolkien Society Seminar: The Mighty and Frail NÃºmenor
* '''10''' - On the Fate of Hobbits by Joris de Moel
* '''12''' - The House where The Hobbit was Born by Cate Palmer-Billing
* '''14''' - Pippin, the Persistent Rebel by Lorie Jones
* '''18''' - Centerfold: Frodo Paper Doll by Francesco S. Savi
* '''20''' - Comparing Notes by Caroline Flynn
* '''22''' - Tolkien Society Members Profile
* '''24''' - Book Review: The Wisdom of Hobbits: Unearthing Our Humanity at 3 Bagshot Row by Amanda Drake
* '''25''' - Obituary: Joanna Tolkien by Charles E. Noad
* '''26''' - Mathom
* '''30''' - News from Fangorn
* '''31''' - Dating Tolkien #6 by Mick Henry
* '''32''' - Behind Glass Doors
* '''33''' - Obituary: [[Mike Foster]]
* '''35''' - Moonrunes Poetry by Mick Henry
